# Here are some plots
```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
```

Import New York state weather stations data from January 1, 1981 through December 31, 2010.
```{r include=FALSE}
nynoaadat <- read_csv("nynoaadat.csv")
nynoaadat_cleaned <- nynoaadat %>%
  filter(!(is.na(prcp) & is.na(snow) & is.na(snwd) & is.na(tmax) & is.na(tmin)))
view(nynoaadat_cleaned)
```
The data of NY  state weather stations data shows the 
id: Weather station ID
date: Date of observation
prcp: Precipitation (tenths of mm)
snow: Snowfall (mm)
snwd: Snow depth (mm)
tmax: Maximum temperature (tenths of degrees C)
tmin: Minimum temperature (tenths of degrees C) from January 1, 1981 through December 31, 2010. It contains r nrow(nycrental) observation and r ncol(nycrental) columns.
